scripts.build: npm run build:compile && npm run build:move && npm run build:packages && npm run build:prepare && npm run build:copy
scripts.build:move: if [ -d dist/apps/api/src ]; then cp -r dist/apps/api/src/* dist/ && rm -rf dist/apps; fi
scripts.build:packages: cd ../../packages/db && npm run build && cd ../../packages/id && npm run build && cd ../../packages/logger && npm run build
scripts.build:copy: cp -r ../../packages/db/dist/* dist/node_modules/@repo/db/dist/ && cp -r ../../packages/id/dist/* dist/node_modules/@repo/id/dist/ && cp -r ../../packages/logger/dist/* dist/node_modules/@repo/logger/dist/
scripts.postbuild: for pkg in db id logger; do cp ../../packages/$pkg/package.json dist/node_modules/@repo/$pkg/; done
scripts.setup-dev-links: mkdir -p node_modules/@repo && rm -rf node_modules/@repo/db node_modules/@repo/id node_modules/@repo/logger && cp -r ../../packages/db node_modules/@repo/ && cp -r ../../packages/id node_modules/@repo/ && cp -r ../../packages/logger node_modules/@repo/ && echo "Symlinks created successfully" && echo "Contents of node_modules/@repo:" && ls -la node_modules/@repo
scripts.dev:linked: NODE_PATH=./node_modules dotenv -e .env.local -- bun run setup-dev-links && NODE_PATH=./node_modules dotenv -e .env.local -- bun src/index.ts
